price: Kada ku bai wa wãwãye* dũkiyarku, wadda Allah Ya sanya ta a gare ku, kunã mãsu tsayuwa (ga gyãranta). Kuma ku ciyar da su a cikinta, kuma ku tufãtar da su, kuma ku gaya musu magana sananniya ta alhẽri.
arabic: وَلَا تُؤۡتُواْ ٱلسُّفَهَآءَ أَمۡوَٰلَكُمُ ٱلَّتِي جَعَلَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ قِيَٰمٗا وَٱرۡزُقُوهُمۡ فِيهَا وَٱكۡسُوهُمۡ وَقُولُواْ لَهُمۡ قَوۡلٗا مَّعۡرُوفٗا
footnotes: * Sa'an nan yadda ake riƙon dũkiyar wãwã wanda bai san yadda ake riƙon dũkiya ba, ko dã shĩ bãligi ne, yã yi aure, kuma ko da shĩ ne yake neman dũkiyarsa da kansa; kamar da ijãra. Wannan wata hanyace ta tsaron haƙƙin mãsu rauni.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tu'tū al-sufahāa amwālakumu allatī jaʿala al-lahu lakum qiyāman wa-ur'zuqūhum fīhā wa-ik'sūhum waqūlū lahum qawlan maʿrūfan
